chara.textHome: H-happy New Year to you!
Do I look okay?

I-I've never really been out in
a kimono before, so...
Good morning!

I'm going to play hanetsuki with Madoka
and the others today. I woke up early so
I wouldn't be late...maybe too early...

Baked rice cake, rice cake soup,
and other New Year's dishes...

I always spent New Year's in my
hospital bed, so it feels different...
The sun sets so early in the winter...

Please bundle up before going outside,
so that you don't catch a cold.

I keep saying this to myself before sleeping,
for years now...

Never forget why you became a Magical Girl,
or that oath you made...
Madoka must be so beautiful in her kimono...

Oh, um, sorry!
I was just, ah...daydreaming a bit...
U-um, Happy New Year...
I-I'm glad we got to meet like this...
Let's w-work hard to take out those Witches!

Now that it's the new year you can see
lots of Magical Girls wearing kimonos
even inside the Mirror Witch's Labyrinth...
Though they're copies, of course...

What! Y-you think I should take off my
glasses while I'm wearing my kimono...?!
N-no! I get so nervous when I take them off...

Oh, now that you mention it... 
That hanetsuki paddle Madoka has...
It has a Kyubey design on it, doesn't it?

When I was in the hospital, I could never
have imagined wearing kimono with
my friends to celebrate the New Year...
It's okay to just enjoy it, right?
Does this kimono...look all right?
Madoka says it suits me, but...I don't know...

Madoka lends me courage with her
strength and positivity that I never had.

So different from me...
I'm just a dopey, selfish, little scaredy-cat...

Kyoko is probably spending New Year's
like any other day...

But her being that way is why she can talk
so calm and collected in any tough situation.

I spent a long time in the hospital,
so walking by all those stalls at
the shrine was really fun...

Maybe because Madoka and the others
were there, too.

I want to hold these memories I made
with Madoka close in my heart...

So I won't stray from my path, no matter
how many times I loop through time.
S-stop that!

If you want to pinch someone's cheeks
like that, you should go find Kyubey!
